Also, it is compatible with red and blue 3-D glasses, and you can see it in 3D by pressing the select button. You can play by switching to 3D mode. Please bring your own glasses.

What is Pico Pi Collection?
This is a new 8-bit style game series that allows you to enjoy a nostalgic and fresh game with a 4-color dot character, single-note BGM, etc.

This work is presented as a game version of a bad but funny comedy manga from the bubble era.

This game is based on the original author's strong wishes and is made to be enjoyed (and tormented) by the unnecessarily long storyline.

*Please note when playing in 3-D mode: This game is visually stimulating, so if you feel unwell, please avoid playing. Also, please do not play for long periods of time and take sufficient breaks while playing.

Other Pico Pi Collection games are currently being distributed, so be sure to check them out!

Two Challenging Dungeons

Venture into two 4-player PvE dungeons, Oathsworn Pit and Bedlam Veil, coming soon to both the Crown Store and ESO Plus memberships.

Oathsworn Pit

A training ground for Malacath's chosen now lies soaked with the blood of the faithful, and the God of Curses demands you enact revenge on behalf of the fallen.

Bedlam Veil

Cultists have invaded the Bedlam Veil, located within the demiplane of Maelstrom. It’s up to you to defend this ancient vault and the mysterious relic it protects.

Rewards for the Worthy

Survive both dungeons to unlock unique rewards, including new item sets, collectibles, achievements, and more not found anywhere else in Tamriel.

There is also a challenge mode patch which provides a more difficult version of the same hack.

Aurelia Chase, a journalist, was caught snooping around in a place she wasn't supposed to be.

The resulting confrontation took an ugly turn.

Once witnesses arrived, they found her inside a locked room. Alongside a dead body.
Now, she stands accused of murder, and has to defend herself.

Will she be able to discover the truth?

Well... That won't be necessary. It would be counterproductive, in fact.
The truth of the matter has been clear from the start.
Because no matter what excuses Aurelia might make, she is guilty.

Blast through thousands of fearsome foes and bonkers bosses from throughout the lauded lineage of Contra games. Persist determinedly through prodigious stages inspired by iconic Konami series, but be prepared for a bullet-hell of a fight, because if your trigger finger lacks stamina, Earth may lack a future.

The DLC adds 11 characters, 22 weapons, 1 large stage, 1 bonus stage, 30 in-game unlocks and a 6 chapter adventure.

name: Never Alone 2

Discover a world of fierce, frozen beauty in Never Alone 2, the upcoming 3D sequel to the BAFTA award-winning adventure drawn from the Iñupiaq storytelling tradition. Journey through the breathtaking Alaska wilderness as Nuna and Fox, her spirit companion, along the way unearthing an epic mystery that threatens your entire community.

Never Alone 2 is being developed using an Inclusive Development process with the Alaska Native community. It tells an original story from an award-winning Iñupiaq writer and draws from tradition and stories that have been shared across generations. Designed to be played co-op (online and couch), Never Alone 2 invites you to explore environments ranging from the harsh frozen tundra to forest valleys filled with ancient willows as you traverse beautifully realized landscapes that are filled with wonder. Together you will work to navigate these wilds, forge connections with the spirits, and experience how the Alaska Native people have survived and thrived for over 10,000 years in one of the harshest and most breathtaking parts of the world.

name: UnderMine 2
description: Delve back into the heart-pounding depths of the Undermine in this action roguelike sequel! Uncover ancient secrets, battle fierce foes, and conquer Delvemore Castle with a friend by your side!

name: Darkest Dungeon II: Kingdoms
description: Kingdoms is a free standalone campaign game mode coming to Darkest Dungeon II. This new game mode challenges players in a desperate race against the clock to find and defeat a monstrous threat before it overwhelms and destroys the Kingdom. Journey across the land to gather resources and battle evil incursions, all while defending a network of safe haven Inns.

name: RKGK
description: Turn heads. Drop jaws. Be bright. In this single-player 3D platformer, you’re the only one who can take down Mr. Buff and his lackies to restore color and life to the citizens of Cap City. Accompany Valah and the RKGK crew on their journey to take down the oppressive B Corp.

name: The Last Spell: Dwarves of Runenberg
description: Protect the haven of Runenberg, lead Dwarves with unique abilities into battle and discover new exclusive Perks, weapons and items in the first DLC of the acclaimed tactical rogue-lite. Dive once more into the chaos of The Last Spell to unleash your unique new weaponry upon the Hordes of Evil.

name: Brotato: Abyssal Terrors
description: Brotato is a top-down arena shooter roguelite where you play a potato wielding up to 6 weapons at a time to fight off hordes of aliens. Choose from a variety of traits and items to create unique builds and survive until help arrives.

name: Old World: Behind the Throne
description:
Old World - Behind the Throne introduces the machinations of the royal court with new mechanics, rivalries, and the ability to leverage your power with opulence projects that bring you closer to victory.

New historical characters take center stage in the role of advisors, viziers, aristocrats, and courtiers. These rising stars bring their own ambitions, desires, and drives with them. Will Alcibiades change his allegiances multiple times throughout his life or will you be able to put an end to his double-dealing antics? Will you let Enlil-nadin-sumi successfully usurp the throne of Babylon? Or will Harpagus betray your ruler after a long life of service? Let others manage your cities and befriend them, or watch as they turn into dangerous rivals fueled by a thirst for power.

name: V Rising: Legacy of Castlevania
description:
In collaboration with Konami Digital Entertainment, Stunlock Studios proudly presents Legacy of Castlevania!

The mighty hero of the Belmont Clan, Simon Belmont, is here to challenge all of Vampire kind. Wielding his legendary Vampire Killer and an infamous arsenal of holy weaponry, no night stalker will be safe from his righteous crusade through Vardoran. Defeat him and unlock the secrets of a brand new weapon, the whip, adapting new combat abilities that embody the grace and precision of the deadly Vampire hunter!

Legacy of Castlevania is a free update releasing as part of V Rising's 1.0 update as it leaves Early Access. The new whip weapon is now a permanent addition to the game and there will always be some way to learn it, while Simon Belmont’s presence is indefinite.

name: The Rogue Prince of Persia
description: Jump into this action roguelite installment in the Prince of Persia series as you flow between death-defying platforming and acrobatic combat as the Prince himself. Battle through the capital city again and again with one goal – find a way to save Persia from a Hun invasion wielding dark magic.

name: Agujero
description: Agujero is a Deep Hole Crawler made for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2024.

name: Bestiario
description: Bestiario is an exciting turn-based combat JRPG based on Spanish mythology and folklore, full of surprises. Should we call it an ÑRPG?

name: Dumb Ways to Dash!
description: Dash through crazy and chaotic levels as you compete against others as your favourite Bean. Dumb Ways to Dash is a brand new crazy 3D race runner game from the world of Dumb Ways To Die.

name: Masters of Madness
description: A pixel art idle clicker game with a dark, magical theme for fans of cosmic horror.

name: I Want Watermelon
description: Sin descripción

name: Lost Chronicles
description:
Investigate the disappearance of a child and unravel the secrets of a deceptively quiet town called Forest Hill.
“Lost Chronicles” is an adventure game in the genre of Hidden Object, with plenty of mini-games and puzzles, unforgettable characters and challenging quests.

name: Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX - Extra Song: "Raison d'être"
description:
Lola's got a new song & outfit!

Rack up over 1000 Kudos to hear Lola's new single "Raison d'être" and see her new Idol Mode outfit by using the "Outfit Changer" ability.
The song has also been added to the jukebox.

name: Glompa
description: Solve matching puzzles in this cozy linker game. Go fishing and relax with your Glompa friends.

name: Tambor Hero
description: Sin descripción

name: Bubble Tea Tycoon
description: Help the kitties build a bubble tea business.

name: The Fallen Star
description: Mario feels burnt out from his usual line of adventures and moves to far away lands, only to find himself interested on a new adventure of his own to learn about what the shine at the top of a far mountain really is. This SMW romhack utilizes lush new graphics and spins new level mechanics on classic Super Mario World gameplay.

name: Quickerflak 2
description: Quickerflak 2 is a retro-hardcore room-beater time-attack super fast-paced minigame.

name: Monster Legacy: New Horizons 2
description: Discover the second part of these peculiar adventurous children who explore fantastic worlds and encounter monsters of all kinds.

name: Waiting for Instructions Run
description: Speed and accuracy are key! The "Waiting for Instructions RUN" is a RUN game in which you must use your typing skills to avoid obstacles. Use your typing skills to lead the human waiting for instructions to the goal in a situation where one fingertip can change his fate!

name: Chaos Trigger
description: Go back and forth in a hail of bullets , use all kinds of weapons to take down your enemies.

name: Ai no Karakuri
description: The vast institute is home to numerous enemies and gimmicks. Use electromagnetic rifles, killer rays, and infrared rays to overcome the strongest enemies and gimmicks!

name: Artificial Fashionista
description: Fashion police, open up! Collect clothes, put together fashionable outfits, and impress your captors — for a chance to regain access to the outside world!

name: Cubicle Farter
description: Make the Spirit of the Bathroom proud by angering co-workers with skilled flatulence! Cubicle Farter is a humorous adventure centered around corporate culture. Lower productivity in the office with your cheeky output and defeat managers to progress through the building.

name: Kart
description: A kart racer?! On PC?! with Steam Workshop support for tracks, racers, and more?! Playable offline or online, with friends or otherwise!? Yeah, you're not dreaming; this is real!

name: Lost in Art: A Miniature Realm
description: Explore the miniature universe filled with Eastern mythology, forgotten folk tales and surprising historical events in this puzzle adventure game. Step into real artworks, unreveal mysteries by solving unique puzzles, and be the hero of the miniature folk.

name: Parts Unknown 2024
description: Parts Unknown is an online multiplayer fighting game aiming to recapture the spirit of old fighting platformers with a unique twist.

name: Ringo Party
description: Join the hilarity in Ringo Party, a local 8-player party game brimming with a diverse range of whimsical mini-games. Challenge your friends with entertaining gadgets and unpredictable gameplay. Perfect for game nights, Ringo Party is a laughter-filled experience where fun reigns supreme!

name: To Be A King: Volume 2 - Part 1
description: Continue the exciting story of a general thrust into uncertain circumstances. Factions all want something from you. Choose who to bed or wed. Compete or consolidate with your foes. Discover more about the factions fighting for dominance in Caudium.

name: Qualle Party: Bonus Maps
description: This DLC gives you 3 more maps in the game.

name: Wartales: The Tavern Opens!
description: Manage and expand your own tavern in this management and simulation expansion for Wartales. During your adventures, secure wealth and prestige for your troop.

name: Dying Under Nightfall
description: Are you ready to test your mettle and prove your worth in the ultimate test of platforming prowess? Enter the fray, brave adventurer, and dare to conquer the impossible in our spine-tingling jump and run experience.

name: Dungeon Chamber
description: Dungeon Chamber is an action game, with an isometric view and character evolution. Three playable classes, MAGE, BARBARIAN and ROGUE(DLC). Acquire exclusive powers and adventure through 10 chambers for each hero. Unique ranking system for each chamber and hero.

name: Dungeon Chamber: Rogue
description: Rogue class hero. Rogue has a crossbow, with freezing arrows, as his main weapon and the difficulty is moderate.

name: Droom
description: Droom is an adventure game of choice-based progression. The rooms are inhabited by a variety of alien life forms, and your choices are the key to success. As you progress through the levels, the threats in the rooms increase and the path becomes more difficult.

name: Drop It: Block Paradise! - Builder Edition
description: Build your own unique puzzle levels and share them with friends! Endless online database filled with levels!

name: Drifting Car Stunter
description: Prepare for an electrifying gaming experience in "Drifting Car Stunter!" This heart-pounding game combines high-speed stunts with precision drifting, delivering a unique and thrilling gameplay adventure. Embark on a journey through a world of challenging tracks and gravity-defying tricks.

name: Drift Boom Boom
description: Drift Your way around 40+ Race Courses, BOOM Fire missiles, shotguns, and more, Boom Blow up your friends in Split-Screen. Just watch out behind you on the final lap!

name: Dreams and Bubbles
description: It is a game that combines maze exploration and action shooting elements.

name: Don't Forget
description: Don’t Forget is a 3D singleplayer story and exploration game inspired by dementia. Recollect your memories by looking for clues and playing brain-stimulating minigames whilst battling the effects of dementia. Explore three different key events of your life to figure out what has happened.

name: Driver4VR: Kinetic
description: The Kinectic system utilizes VR headset and controllers for immersive full body tracking without extra hardware, optimizing for low CPU usage.

name: Dreaming After You
description: Play as a Duskweaver in this short "choices matter" story about self-sacrifice.

name: Daisy The Swimmer
description: Hunt fish with the iron swimmer Daisy at the beautiful beach of Parang Blue Island. And crush the vile pirates aiming for the caught fish. Daisy's companions each have their own unspeakable stories. Gain their trust and reach the hidden truths of Parang Blue Island.

name: Darksword: Nephilim
description: This is a single-player dungeon for "Darksword: Battle Eternity". Please use this content after updating to the latest version.

name: Dark Tonic's Blunderbusted: Guns Out, Bluns Out
description: BLUNDERBUSTED is the world's first roguelike lightgun shooter! Arcade action with destructible stages, crazy powerup combos, and just... too many enemies.

name: Alone: Chapter 1
description:
Your name is Joseph. A boy who was just leaving school and something happened.
You wake up in a room with a small headache. Scared, decide to leave the room and with the only objective: Find a way out.

name: Decked in Love
description: "Decked in Love" is Inspired by games like "Slay the Spire" and "Ring of Pain". Contains roguelike-deckbuilding and visual novel elements for an adult audience: craft a unique deck, choose your own style, do activities with your crush, and overcome any obstacles put between you two!

name: DCS: Mi-24P OutPost Campaign by Stone Sky
description: Prepare for an immersive series of campaigns OUTPOST, that places you at the forefront of real combat operations within the Syrian Arab Republic.In the intricate geopolitical landscape, Syria stands as a pivotal outpost for both Russia and the United States.

name: Delivery Mayhem
description: Race against time, embrace chaos, and become the ultimate delivery daredevil in "Delivery Mayhem." Top-down mayhem meets high-speed action!

name: Demon Hunting Diary
description: Internet scams and the badger game are just two of the many incidents that have shattered this rare moment of relaxation. It must be that the demons have come out to wreak havoc on the world again. When the new magic weapon I bought on the Internet arrives, I'll capture you all to have sex with me!

name: Depths of Ascension
description: Depths of Ascension is a turn-based, tile-based traditional roguelike set in a high fantasy world inspired by Sumeria and the early Bronze Age cultures. Explore the twisting corridors of the Maze of Madness and use magic, stealth, diplomacy, brute force, the Gods, anything, to reach the Ascension.

name: Desire: Mrs. Claus
description: Desire: Mrs. Claus is a captivating puzzle game with 18 levels, each featuring a sensual Mrs. Claus. Get into the holiday spirit, exercise your mind, and have fun with this relaxing and exciting game.

name: Destiny Star Girlfriend 2
description: Seiji’s “tied by fate” again, this time with a magical girl one year his senior! In part 2 of this rowdy rom-com VN series, a freak faceoff sees Seiji become Maja’s familiar—and bound by an enchanted tether to survive. Will proximity lead to love, or is he doomed to serve till the end of (his) days?

name: Diesel Skies
description: Build and customize your cars, scavenge for scraps and fuel and fight raiders for survival in a vast post-apocalyptic open world filled with danger.

name: Dino Rush
description: Welcome to Dino Rush – the ultimate test of survival in a prehistoric world! Dodge and sprint your way through a relentless horde of dinosaurs as you strive to survive for as long as possible. Encounter a variety of dinosaurs, push your reflexes to the limit in this pulse-pounding action experience!

name: Dirt Bike: Unlimited Bike Experience
description: Craft your ultimate off-road machine by customizing every part, from wheels to exhaust. Race through sprawling landscapes, mastering jumps to hit checkpoints before time runs out. Explore the wilderness, conquer the trails, and become the off-road champion!

name: Dominion: Cornucopia - 1st Edition
description: This 1st Edition pack requires owning the corresponding expansion to play. The 10 cards removed from Cornucopia when it went to its 2nd edition. These were removed for a reason! But if you want them anyway, here they are.

name: Diorama Drift
description: Diorama Drift aims for driving delight, offering a relaxed experience as you skillfully drift through otherworldly dioramas. Unleash the art of controlled slides in this journey of exploration and joy.

name: The Sims 4: Urban Homage Kit
description: Strut boldly into the now with iconic styles from The Sims 4 Urban Homage Kit.

name: The Sims 4: Party Essentials Kit
description: Coordinate your décor to build the perfect party atmosphere with The Sims 4 Party Essentials Kit.

name: Helenenkapelle VR
description: Eine historische Reise durch die Zeit, von der Blühtezeit der Kapelle bis zum Ende als Ruine.

name: Gutter: The Perished
description: Play the role of a restless spirit in this spooky new mini-campaign.

name: Harmoni
description: Open Source 4K Rhythm Game

name: Heads Will Roll: Reforged - Not a Hero
description: DLC adds a new story branch that sees the main character return home from France not as a wealthy and reputable warrior but as the same lowly peasant who is now scarred by war and trained to kill.

name: Hentai: Beach Day
description: Begin a sexy beach vacation filled with adorable girls in this hentai-inspired jigsaw game! Dive into the world of Hentai: Beach Days, where you'll be captivated by the irresistible charm of plenty of nude and lovely girls with a lot to show off! ️

name: Hentai: Devil Girls
description: Begin a sexy journey filled with adorable devil girls in this hentai-inspired jigsaw game! Dive into the world of Hentai: Devil Girls, where you'll be captivated by the irresistible charm of plenty of nude and lovely girls with a lot to show off!

name: Hentai Girls: Sexy Feet Goddesses
description: Where feet lovers and hentai enjoyers come together! Enjoy all these beautiful girl's lovely feet with 33 levels to complete. Complete their puzzles to view them in the gallery and admire them better! Imagine the smell!

name: Hentai Milf
description: Relax with the beautiful girls and collect them all. A great solution after a busy day!

name: Hoverbear
description: You're a thrill seeking bear, equipped with the latest hoverboard technology, it is your mission to go fast and get to the finish line before anyone else. Any tricks performed along the way are at your own risk!

name: Hot Office: Sex Story
description: Welcome to the thrilling world of Hot Office: Sex Story – an adult visual novel where every decision and choice impacts the development of a captivating storyline. Step into the shadowy realm of financial intrigues and risky investigations!

name: Hot And Lovely: Dream
description: Hot And Lovely: Dream is a classic match-3 casual game. Players need to move blocks to eliminate three or more prescribed tiles to complete the goal, and each level needs to be controlled within the specified number of steps. If it exceeds the number, the game will fail!

name: Horn of Balance
description: Come explore this world of secrets and adventure. Featuring solid 2D Zelda-like gameplay, vast non-linear dungeons and a wholesome story about a young golem protagonist called Linden.

name: Homing Instinct
description: Please send a completely intoxicated person home safely.

name: H.O.G.S
description: H.O.G.S is an immersive fps where you play as a pig cop in a dystopian England ruled by pigs. Engage enemies in fast-paced combat where the difference between life and death is a well-placed bullet, an object to the head, or a boot to the face.

name: Hobgoblins Against Dwarfs
description: Craft an unstoppable defence using Dwarven Towers and a fearless squad, then take on waves of invading Hobgoblins in this thrilling real-time strategy tower defence game! Strategize, upgrade, and triumph in Hobgoblins Against Dwarfs!

name: Hunt Hide Run
description: A multiplayer 'Hide-and-seek' game with robots.

name: Hypnosis Card 2
description: "Hypnosis Card 2" is a card battle game with deck building, introducing a new concept of body parts. Players can interact and battle with many girls through cards of different genres.

name: I Am Dog
description: I Am Dog is a 2D vertical scrolling platformer where you play as Dog! Chomp, stomp and bomb your way through dirt, stone and enemies and reach the bottom of the depths to rescue Dog's friends!

name: Icy Incline
description: "Icy Incline" is a experience where you control a penguin sliding through 24 icy trails. Race against time, avoid obstacles, and find the best route for the fastest time and reach the end of each trail. See your performance with stats like best score, worst score, and crashes.

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - The Son of Gunpowder
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary Weapons, and one Legendary Consumable: The Conspirator (Hunter), Crown Cinders (Martini-Henry IC1), Royal Sabotage (Scottfield Model 3), Forefather’s Fury (Vitality Shot).

name: Kunkun Terror Express
description: You're trapped aboard the endless loop of the Kunkun Terror Express. observe your surroundings and search for items.it's your only hope of escape! But beware: Kunkun might be right behind you! A meme horror game by the creators of 'Exit Kun', inspired 'Exit 8'.

name: Kokuriko
description: Kokuriko, Wake up. The boy doesn't care, everything is gray to him. until he accidentally shreds a book, which he finds interesting but more guilty, trying to fix it back piece by piece... unraveling the big picture from the messy details. a short Cinematic, Slice-of-life, puzzle game.

name: Kobold Underground Agency
description: The Kobolds need your help! Explore the frontiers of this underground world using physics based vehicles that you design yourself. Bring a friend and play in split-screen. What will you discover together?

name: Kingdom Rush 5: Alliance
description: While a formidable evil emerges, an unexpected alliance is taking shape! It will take the finest warriors of Linirea and the relentless Dark Army to stop it. Beware! Though they may journey side by side the ever-changing winds of fate could swiftly alter their course.

name: Killcolor
description: A rougelite top-down shooter where you collect random upgrades to kill hostile color entities.

name: Katzala
description: Embark on a deeply emotional journey as a cat spirit exploring a troubled village from eastern France. Listen to conversations, manipulate your environment, influence dreams, discover hidden memories and battle buried traumas. Explore mental health and unravel your own story along the way.

name: Jumping Challenge
description: Who can challenge the 100th floor.

name: Judge of Hasoon
description: It's a mystery game in which a story is told through options. Play the game in a beautiful dot background.

name: Lilith Rising: Season 2
description: Lilith Rising - Season 2 is a choice-driven Adult Visual Novel. Return as the prince that was exiled from by a demon warshiping cult, with your companions journay to become stronger to save your kingdom. Your adventure will be filled with epic fights, romance, mystery, humor, drama and lots of sex.

name: limentional
description: Trapped in a surreal and liminal environment and in your mind, you'll be pressed to use all your skills to find a way of escape.

name: Let's Get Fit at Midnight, Shall We?
description: Following the contract, they engage in erotic muscle training every night at midnight, but due to a decrease in stamina, completing the full course proves to be challenging. Together with a beautiful trainer, the protagonist strives to complete the full course.

name: Lethal Infiltration: Ghost Reconnaissance
description: Play as Ethan Hayes, an elite operative tasked with infiltrating terrorist strongholds, gathering intelligence, and preventing global conflict. Engage in stealth action and unravel intrigue in this adrenaline-fueled thriller.

name: Legend of Marrow
description: Encounter a series of obstacles and puzzles that challenges Marrow both physically and mentally.

name: I'm Determined to Make 3A: 01/65
description: My name is Bao Qiang, I have two dreams: 1st, to make the first "Civic 3A" in the world. 2nd, to change the entire game industry. I plan to achieve them simultaneously through my invention, the "65 protect 1 development plan". But players, I need your help.

name: I`m Isekai Hero
description: Welcome to the extraordinary and magical island of your dreams! If you have always wanted to reach the island where the secret desires of every man come true, then this is the very island where it is possible!

name: Interstate Drifter 1999: Hyperdrive
description: Activate the Hyperdrive!

name: In The Dragon's Wake
description: To survive you must scavenge, craft, build and fight your way through a treacherous open-world environment teeming with monsters, wildlife, forgotten temples, and derelict research facilities. Beware, a mysterious dragon freely roams the skies and stalks the grounds, and it is never too far away.

name: Isonzo: Third Wave
description: From specialist high-altitude combat uniforms to exhausted and bloody late war veterans and ersatz troops, the Third Wave contains a broad variety of cosmetic options for Italian and Austro-Hungarian forces. It will also include a third DLC to be announced in the future!

name: Island Paradise
description: Island Paradise is a survival game where you build, upgrade, customize your own island and use nearby resources to create a home for generations to come!

name: Island of Enchantment
description: This is a relaxing and casual little game. You need to help the beautiful girls to find their lost things. This game can provide you with a relaxing experience while also exercising your intuition and concentration.

name: Isekai Truck Driver
description: "ISEKAI Truck Driver" is a game where you drive a truck through the city, constantly searching for targets and transporting them. Complete missions assigned by goddesses, and have closer relationships.

name: Isekai Awakening
description: A pixel art point-and-click RPG where you explore a medieval fantasy world and have relationships with beautiful girls.

name: Iron Hunters
description: Hunt down war criminals hidden in the galaxies! But be careful, the planets that hide them are as dangerous as themselves. Iron Hunters is an action roguelike bullet hell where you will control, evolve and assemble your Mechs to hunt down criminals using a variety of weapons and synergies.

name: Isekai Valley
description: A 3D open world survival, farming and crafting multiplayer game, where you can survive, build, farm, craft, and catch to evolve your wild kin, the "Neuramons," into human-like beings like yourself!

name: Hentai Nurse
description: Hentai Sport is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.

name: Hentaimon
description: Hentaimon is a old-school classic monster-catcher with a special lewd twist. Bond with Hentaimon and explore a broad world filled with thrilling turn-based battles, a mysterious threat awaiting defeat, and lots and lots of hentai. It's time for you to explore the wonder world of these monster girls!

name: Hentai Nana
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Guragura Oden
description: Do you know the traditional Japanese dish "Oden"? This is a puzzle game in which you pile up ingredients in an earthenware pot that shakes unsteadily and unsteadily! Try to pile up ingredients until the pot loses its balance and collapses to get a high score!

name: Hentai Witch
description: Swap puzzle pieces to complete levels and unlock more viewing modes.Watch the full picture after completing the puzzle.

name: Hentai: Waifu World
description: Embark on a sexy journey filled with adorable waifu girls in this hentai-inspired jigsaw game! Dive into the world of Hentai: Waifu World, where you'll be captivated by the irresistible charm of plenty of nude and lovely girls with a lot to show off!

name: Hentai Uniform
description: Hentai Uniform is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.

name: Hentai Senpai: Pirates!
description: Set sail on a steamy journey in Hentai Senpai: Pirates!! Solve puzzles to free over 150 sultry Buccaneers in dazzling 4K. Explore the gallery, choose yer favorites, and indulge in a pirate's paradise. ‍☠️🧩

name: Hentai Puppy Maid
description: Hentai Puppy Maid is an Hentai Visual Novel for adults where your maid on duty will do her best to fullfill your needs, specially the sexual ones!. Become a good master for your maid and make sure to reward her hard work!

name: Hero Siege: Stormweaver
description: The Stormweaver commands the tempestuous power of thunder and lightning, shocking through the undead with electrifying grace. With each crack of thunder and flash of lightning she leaves the battlefields full of steaming ash.

name: Hey! Here Are Some Letters
description: A word based action-puzzle game.

name: Heyspresso
description: Brew up a storm in this 2D physics-based coffee shop management sim! Juggle beans, blend flavors, and keep your customers buzzing with delight!

name: H Girl Kemonomimi
description: Swap tiles to reveal 5 kemonomimi characters with NSFW jiggle physics images. Relax with easy puzzles or challenge yourself with expert difficulty level. Completed puzzles can be viewed later in the gallery. Swap, match and have love!

name: HighScore Anomaly Underground
description: Observe your surrounding and be confident there is or is not a anomaly to progress

name: Mad Island
description: This survival game is packed with features including crafting, exploring, building, excavation, farming, fishing, capturing creatures, torture, battle, and a story with many forks along the way. The objective is to escape the island, but is that really your only choice?

name: Luma Nest
description: Become the newest member of the Lumanite association in Luma Nest! An open-world, action RPG where you build up your character and world in the overworld before venturing deep into the interconnected underworld.

name: Luminous Crusader
description: A territory control action game where you dodge enemies and clear darkness with just your mouse. Evade attacks and secure enough territory to advance. A love scene with a fully voiced heroine awaits at the end.

name: Luminous Skies: Interstellar
description: Embark on a journey through the stars in a turn based sci-fi RPG. Switch between two clone soldiers and two robust classes. Gather resources and make food out of it. Search for rare weapons and armor through the universe. Build up your friendships with the crew. Play fun mini games.

name: Lunar City Builder
description: Lunar City Builder is a city-building game where you're in charge to build the city, build a community & solve their problems. You can engage with every residents. They have their own tastes, schedules, and needs that you'll have to meet.

name: Lunar Mirror: Moon Night Without Light
description: This's a distinctive puzzle adventure. A young teacher enters a remote archaeological school in the mountains to search for her missing father. During her time at the school, numerous inexplicable events occur, leading the teacher to realize that her father’s disappearance was not a mere coincidence

name: Lust & Legends
description: Embark on a journey of intrigue, romance, and adventure in Lust & Legends, a mature open-world RPG that plunges players into the immersive realm of Astoria. As a squire named Tristan, you must navigate the complexities of a medieval world filled with secrets, mysteries, and desires.

name: Machine Runaway
description: MACHINE RUNAWAY is a third-person shooter game where you aim from 200 floors underground to the surface. The protagonist can transform into enemy characters. Make full use of the abilities of various enemy characters to advance the game to your advantage.

name: Majyo Crush
description: This is a Japanese-style beautiful girl elimination game, where you can meet and conquer various witches with different personalities. How will you, as a gentleman, make decisions when facing their problems and challenges? Hurry up and take action before dawn!

name: Malachite: Temple of the Sun
description: Temple-trotting, sphere-shooting fun!

name: Maledictor
description: Classic, dark ambience in a bloody and difficult retro FPS. Fight cultists and demons who are as dangerous as you in your fight against the Maledictor.

name: Mana Cycle
description: Mana Cycle is a fast-paced puzzle party game with a unique twist on falling block mechanics, featuring strategic cycle-based piece-clearing. Compete with friends locally or online in thrilling multiplayer matches!

name: Manaulyn
description: An action-adventure game based around a dog rescuing a lost friend from a hydra and kraken. Shoot magic at the mythicals and take them out as you explore the forests of an abandoned Earth. Defeat the Kraken and Hydra to win the day.

name: Mango 64
description: Join Mango on a high-speed adventure in this fast-paced 3D platformer!

name: Minesweeper Twist
description: A variant of the classic game Minesweeper on an irregular grid, where each tile can have between 6 and 10 neighbors, leading to more challenging and mind-bending levels.

name: Mind Keeper
description: Mind Keeper is a roguelite shooter and base-building game where you have to construct your own stronghold, which is a representation of your mental integrity, and you must defend it from the relentless waves of inner demons determined to destroy you.

name: Midway Accident
description: This is a multi-person survival and escape game. You need to find what you need in the game and then get out of here.

name: Midnight Lane
description: It's a short horror experience that deals with the fear of dark city streets. Or maybe it's the fear of the daily routine, when the maniac's break-in is just a deliverance

name: Miaow.Emma
description: This is a point-and-click adventure game where you go on an adventure with the cat Emma! A well-structured and exciting adventure story organized by episode awaits you. Go on an adventure with Emma and uncover her secrets.
